content: For a 'TED-like' talk about FHIR for a management type audience, I'm working on a list to briefly show that quite a few EU countries are using carrot (subsidies) and/or stick (legislation) to a) force healthcare providers to share data, and b) that they should use FHIR to do so. I've got some of the details on UK,NL,AT,CH,DE,BE - would you be able to add the details of some of the other countries ?
